metadata.title: CVE-2021-39891 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In all versions of GitLab CE/EE since version 8.0, access tokens created aspart of admin's impersonation of a user are not cleared at the end ofimpersonation which may lead to unnecessary sensitive info disclosure.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
